com.vangav.backend.cassandra.keyspaces_generator.json

Class KeyspaceJson

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.cassandra.keyspaces_generator.json.KeyspaceJson

  • public class KeyspaceJson
extends java.lang.Object
    KeyspaceJson represents a Cassandra's keyspace

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String description
      description explains the purpose of this keyspace, used to: - generate comments for keyspace's generated client code - generate description for phriction wiki keyspace entry
      java.lang.String name
      keyspace's name (e.g.: analysis)
      ReplicationJson[] replications
      replications different replication methods for this keyspace (e.g.: single node and one replica for dev mode and multi-node multi-replica for prod mode)
      TableJson[] tables
      keyspace's tables

    • Constructor Summary
